subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: This German soccer squad is not about to waltz to a cowardly draw with the Americans in their World Cup match on Thursday, even if it would suit both teams.
snippet: This German soccer squad is not about to waltz to a cowardly draw with the Americans in their World Cup match on Thursday, even if it would suit both teams.
